question: What is the theme of 2017 International Rare Disease Day (IRDD)?
explanation: The International Rare Disease Day (IRDD) is held every year on the last day of February to raise awareness for rare diseases and improve access to treatment and medical representation for individuals with rare diseases and their families. The 2017 IRDD is held on February 28 with theme \"Research‚Äù and slogan \'With research, possibilities are limitless\' to recognize the crucial role that patients play in research.
